info.title: Balls of Steel
info.author: EvilTroopa
info.details:
I've got balls of steel. And I like to use 'em.
	
	Use the Wiimote NES-style to make your way through the level(s).
	D-Pad Left/Right : move the ball
	Button 2 : jump !
	
	Made by EvilTroopa and Olyfno
	http://www.eviltroopa.com
	http://www.olyfno.com
